website_summaries.verdict: A 48-ounce capacity blender with a 600W motor and touch-controls.
pros: The BPA-free container is lightweight and the motor provides enough power for most users
Features an attractive base and the lid seals well
Touch-controls are basic but simple to navigate
cons: Performs poorly when tasked with crushing ice or frozen items
Some worried about the product's durability

customer_reviews.title: A change from the heavy glass blenders...
customer_reviews.text: When I first took the top piece of the blender out of the box, I said to myself....(insert sarcasm here) "Great, it's plastic." But, in retrospect I am glad that it is. It is lightweight and easier to pick-up to store on my kitchen shelf. I have washed it in the dishwasher and haven't had any problems in that department either.
customer_reviews.author: SaviMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice but breaks after 6 months or so
customer_reviews.text: We bought this twice because we liked how it worked but twice the plastic bottom part where it spins has broken
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for not complicated
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for the money. great for not complicated mixes
customer_reviews.author: Ivaylo Ivanov

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in quality of material but especially performance of product
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made product that did not perform as advertised. Although advertised as able to chop ice, this product hardly chopped partially thawed blueberries. Very disappointed in quality of material but especially performance of product.
customer_reviews.author: college student

customer_reviews.title: Nice blender with good power
customer_reviews.text: I brought this to my office to make sure it got a good workout. My co-workers and I are enjoying smoothies in the morning thanks to this blender. It has plenty of power. It works through both frozen and room temperature ingredients with ease for us. Clean up isn't bad, either, though I'm used to blenders that come apart completely. I wish this one did that.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Great blender!
customer_reviews.text: Great blender! I use it daily to make smoothies with fresh and frozen fruit, almond butter, ice, etc. and it does a fabulous job. This is the first one I've ever used that can make a proper smoothie and mixed drink that isnt commercial grade at a cost of hundreds of dollars. It is easy to clean and even my 11 year old didn't have any problems removing and replacing the blade for cleaning. Much quieter than the Oster I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great for Smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Great blender, easy to use, I especially love the ice crush setting for making smoothies and other drinks, blends real smooth and detaches and reattaches just as smoothly for easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: JDuB

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BLENDER!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this blender. I have had this blender for three months. The blade assembly will not come off. When I called Cuisinart to get help, I was told to "just turn it really hard." Then I was told that they would fix it but that they would charge me to do so. Then the supervisor told me "I can't come to your house and do it for you." I told him that Kitchenaid just found a new customer.
customer_reviews.author: CLP74

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blender
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart makes very high quality products, and this blender is no exception. Very sturdy, robust, and powerful, it should meet all your culinary needs for blending, crushing, mixing, etc. Smoothies and other mixes are a snap. It's very attractively designed, and the parts all seem to be of top drawer quality. The blades are stainless steel. It has push-button controls on the front panel that are clear and easy to understand. The mixing container comes off easily for pouring and cleaning, and the entire unit stores easily. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Brian Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent blender, powerful
customer_reviews.text: First time users, be sure to screw the container-jar into the motor base before you use it.. Don't just let it sit on the base; it will leak. Excellent blender, powerful. Makes smoothies easily. The controls on the front are convenient. The pulse function works with whichever speed you are using, which is a nice feature. We haven't tried everything with this blender yet, but it seems capable of doing any blending job we would use it for. We have experienced none of the problems reported by some reviewers. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst blender I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst blender I've ever had. Sure, it blends things alright--but it also leaks out the bottom at least 75-80% of the time, even when I've taken pains to make sure the base is screwed on tightly. No end to the frustration of cleaning up the mess from my kids' morning smoothies. I just bought a Ninja to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Fine blender, when filled for fruit smoothies has trouble ...
customer_reviews.text: Fine blender, when filled for fruit smoothies has trouble blending all the way at the top without stirring. Works much better when filled half way or less. Cons: The gasket is vertical, which is an unusual design and means you have to buy replacement gaskets through Cuisinart, which including shipping was 16 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Billiam

customer_reviews.title: worst blender
customer_reviews.text: It keeps stopping every minute with blinking light and then you have to wait 5 minute to function again. I am buying another one with different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rumax

product_meta.title: Cuisinart SPB-8BK Remix6.0 Blender, 600-watt, Black
product_meta.description: The Cuisinart remix6.0 600-Watt is the blender you've been waiting for! this premium power blender features our patented stainless steel blade and a large BPA-free plastic jar. Blend or pulse at low and high speeds, or touch ice crush to chop ice for a crowd! Cuisinart makes it all quick and easy!; Cuisinart remix6.0 600-Watt blender, white.
feature_bullets: Low, high, pulse and ice crush controls
Electronic touchpad controls with led indicators

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
